Package it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceLocation, Scoring, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceLocation, Scoring, java.lang.Cloneable
Board represents the board of each player It is a container of the classes which represents board's elements
